title: Cincy Tech Slack - Dev Survey
description_html:
Results from Cincy Tech Slack Developer Survey Years: 2021, 2019, 2017

Check out some cool data visualizations generated from this dataset:

  • Happiness By Remote Status
  • Happiness By Years Experience
  • Salary Range By Years Experience
  • Salary Range By Gender

The survey questions can be found here

  • Cincinnati Tech Survey 2021

all_years_results.sql:
with all_years as (
  select
    years_exp,
    company_size,
    happy_score,
    gender,
    skills,
    salary_norm,
    2017 as results_year
  from
    results_2017
  union all
  select
    years_exp,
    company_size,
    happy_score,
    gender,
    skills,
    salary_norm,
    2019 as results_year
  from
    results_2019
  union all
  select
    years_exp,
    company_size,
    happy_score,
    gender,
    skills,
    salary_norm,
    2021 as results_year
  from
    results_2021
)
select
  *
from
  all_years
all_years_results.title: Use this query to get results of all years
